sentences.en: She stood, swaying her hips, moving rhythmically.
sentences.cn: 她站着，摇摆着臀部，有节奏地动着。

sentences.en: They danced rhythmically, swaying their hips to the music.
sentences.cn: 他们伴着音乐扭动屁股，有节奏地跳舞。

sentences.en: She turns the pebbles over and over, rhythmically, rocking.
sentences.cn: 她将鹅卵石有节奏的一遍一遍地翻转。
